girls.name: Gemma
girls.description: The birthday girl herself! Very excited for her 3rd birthday bender in Melbourne. It will be interesting to see if her phone screen can survive the first night without her smashing it.
strengths: Heating up frozen sausie rolls and party pies
weaknesses: Shrinking her clothes in the wash

girls.name: Rina
girls.description: From Taupiri so you know she's gunna be a good time. Harry Potter and Kathmandu enthusiast. Practices country music in front of the mirror in her spare time.
strengths: Cooking bacon and eggs for dinner

girls.name: Rhi
girls.description: Specializes at getting the party started by playing a pharrell song. Really good at cutting shapes at festivals. Also good at cooking feeds and tidying up our house and reorganizing cupboards.
strengths: Organizing China town dinners and Austraila day weekend
weaknesses: Locking herself out of our apartment
Getting lost at the train station

girls.name: Leish
girls.description: What a joker! Always brings the party and good jokes (most of the time).
strengths: Having a meme/giffy for every possible situation
weaknesses: Getting too many strikes for bad jokes

girls.name: Bridget
girls.description: Everyone loves Bridgee poose! Always brings over the best snacks and probably has the most interesting work stories.After missing the last couple of years, we are expecting big things, no pressure!
strengths: Cooking and making the best food including home made sausage rolls.
weaknesses: Keeping the house secure from strange men breaking in (Bernie)

girls.name: Hayley
girls.description: Also Hayley's first August bender so I'm sure she will bring some good laughs if she can stay awake.
strengths: Being one of the last ones standing (Because she's had a sleep in the club)

girls.name: Kayla
girls.description: Apparently she is just coming off dry July so might need to keep an eye on this one!
weaknesses: Anything more than a couple of drinks!
Has a Kim Kardashian crying face

boys.name: Karl
boys.description: King of all thugs and leader of the wolf pack. I will be making sure no one steps out of line this weekend. Watch out!
strengths: Not enough space left in the cloud to list them all
weaknesses: Getting full zombie mode while drinking

boys.name: Bernie
boys.description: Easily talks the most bull shit out of anyone and in a league of his own when it comes to being the drunkest person out and about in Melbourne.Has the ability to go from stone cold sober to running out around naked throwing skate boards at windows in less than 10 minutes.Highly likely to be a good source of entertainment throughout the weekend.
strengths: Breaking into Bridget and Hayley's house to make them garlic bread
Navigating complicated subways in Hong Kong while on tinder

boys.name: Luca
boys.description: All round GC. Works the hardest and longest out of all the boys.
weaknesses: Staying up late on school nights
Being on time because he lives out in the burbs

boys.name: Mitch
boys.description: Loves a couple beers and hanging out with the boys. Reasonable chat when hes not too grumpy or busy tanning his eyelids.Failed to make the wine tour last year so expecting big things to make up for it this time round.
strengths: Rugby and touch - just made the NRC!
Looking like a thug in his ute
weaknesses: Being creepy Mitch (could also come under strengths)

boys.name: Horse
boys.description: All round thug. Loves a good laugh and always up for a few.
strengths: Putting bets on shit and actually winning
Making sure the show goes on
